reviewText: The Art of Knitting and Crochet 2 is a great addition to the series.  The Music To Knit By selections were entertaining and I had a lot of fun building upon what I learned from the first DVD of the series: The Art of Knitting.  Nancy Brown's crochet demos made it so easy to learn how to crochet.  In addition, there's a great Stitch-Along for felting and a wonderful resource guide.  This DVD has everyting a knitter needs to know at the push of a button and is perfect for all levels of knitters.  There is no better DVD encyclopedia on the market!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Truly a great addition to The Art of Knitting series.  The Art of Knitting and Crochet 2 is everything I would expect and more from a sequel to one of my favorite knitting DVD's The Art of Knitting.  From the shell stitch-along to the granny square stitch-along, I had a lot of fun with this DVD!  I'm still using the purse I made from the stitch-along in this DVD till this day=)  This DVD is a must have for anyone who loves to knit & crochet!
summary: Wonderful addition to the Art of Knitting Series!!!
Title: N/A

reviewText: This dvd is excellent! It's a great follow-up to The Art of Knitting, which I also have and enjoy tremendously!!! Nancy Brown's stitch-alongs were great and the crochet portion is a wonderful start for anyone who is new to the world of crocheting.  The Art of Knitting and Crochet 2 is definitely a top pick amongst the many knitting dvd's in my collection.  You simply have to see this dvd for yourself...it's a resource you'll always come back to and use as you progress as a knitter.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is a great resource for me.  I am a visual learner, and I can watch the same part over and over as much as I need to until I get the stitch right.  I can skip parts and watch and learn.I have mastered quite a few stitches from purchasing this CD..
Title: N/A

reviewText: The Art of Knitting and Crochet 2 was my first introduction to crocheting. It made learning to crochet really really easy. Everytihng is shot nice and close and Nancy Brown's demos are right on point. You'll make some fun stuff with this dvd...it's great if you love to knit and are always on the lookout for additional knitting projects and are interested in learning to how to crochet. I love this dvd and I know you will too!!!
Title: N/A

reviewText: As an experienced knitter I can truly say that this DVD is an invaluable resource!  I also loved the first DVD of this series (The Art of Knitting), which is why I bought this one and was very pleased with the crochet section.  The stitchalongs were fantastic and the A-Z index is just wonderful for instantly a specific topic.  I am very happy with this DVD and would give it more stars if I could=)
